Extensions/String.html#/s:SS23Quick_NA_M.name: firstUppercased
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS23Quick_NA_M.abstract: This calculated property returns the string with its first letter uppercased.

Extensions/String.html.name: String
Extensions/String.html.abstract: This extension lets us uppercase only the first letter of the string (used for weekdays).

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: graceTimeSectionLabel
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: This is the overall section label for the Grace Period Setting.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: graceTimeDescriptiveTextView
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: This is the textual dexcription of that section.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: graceTimePickerLabel
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: This is the label that goes just over the Grace Time picker.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: graceTimePicker
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: This is the picker view for selecting a Grace Time.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: explainText
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: This is the main explanation text item.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: _getPickerValueForRow(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: Matches a row index to a value.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: _getPickerRowForValue(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: Matches a value to a row index (opposite of above).

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: We use this to make sure our NavBar has the correct title.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: We use this to make sure our NavBar is shown.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: pickerView(_:viewForRow:forComponent:reusing:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: This returns the name for the given row.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.name: pickerView(_:didSelectRow:inComponent:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchSettingsViewC.abstract: This is called when the user finishes selecting a row.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultsTableC.name: meetingDescriptionTextView
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultsTableC.abstract: The text view for the meeting description.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultsTableC.name: distanceLabel
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultsTableC.abstract: The label that displays the distance from the search center.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: _resultsTable
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: This is the table that displays the results.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: _sortSegmentedSwitch
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: This is a segmented switch that dictates how the results are sorted.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: searchCenterCoords
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: This contains the center of the search, as specified at the start of things.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: We use this to make sure our NavBar has the correct title.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: We use this to make sure our NavBar is shown.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: prepare(for:sender:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: Called as we prepare to bring in the meeting list.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: viewDidLayoutSubviews()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: Make sure we recalculate our table if things have changed.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: _sortResults(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: This sorts the results, according to the selector switch.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: _showMeetingDetails(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: This will bring in a detailed meeting view for the selected meeting.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: Returns the number of meetings to be displayed.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: Returns a cell object that represents a single meeting.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.name: tableView(_:didSelectRowAt:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchResultViewCon.abstract: This reacts to a table row being selected.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.name: GracePeriod
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.abstract: This represents how long we allow a meeting to be in progress before we remove it from our list of candidates.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.name: DistanceUnits
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.abstract: This represents the units we use for our distance display. The string that is stored and returned in the localization key, not the displayed string.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.name: ResultSort
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.abstract: This dictates how the results are sorted. If 0, then they are sorted by time. If 1, they are sorted by distance.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.name: DetailsMapType
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.abstract: In the More Info screen, the user can select a map type. This is saved here. 0 = standard, 1 = hybrid, 2 = satellite.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: _mainPrefsKey
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This is the key for the prefs used by this app.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: _loadedPrefs
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: We load the user prefs into this Dictionary object.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: _sSingletonPrefs
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This is how we enforce a SINGLETON pattern.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.name: PrefsKeys
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs/PrefsKe.abstract: These are the keys we use for our persistent prefs dictionary.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: init()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: We do this to prevent the class from being instantiated in a different context than our controlled one.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: _savePrefs()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This method simply saves the main preferences Dictionary into the standard user defaults.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: _loadPrefs()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This method loads the main prefs into our instance storage.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: prefs
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This is how the singleton instance is instantiated and accessed. Always use this variable to capture the prefs object.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: using12hClockFormat
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This tells us whether or not the device is set for military time.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: usingKilometeres
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This tells us whether or not the device is set for kilometers.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: weekdayNameFromWeekdayNumber(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: Gets a localized version of the weekday name from an index.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: rootURI
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This is a read-only property, as the value is read from the plist file.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.name: sortResultsByDistance
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html#/s.abstract: Should we sort meetings by distance? If false, we sort by day and time. Default is false.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: sRegularAnnotationOffsetUp
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: This is how many display units to shift the annotation view up.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: sRegularAnnotationOffsetRight
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: This is how many display units to shift the annotation view right.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: animationFrames
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: The frames to be drawn during an animation.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: isDraggable
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: We override this, so we can be sure to refresh the need for a draw state when draggable is set (Meaning it’s a black marker).

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: coordinate
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: This gives us a shortcut to the annotation prpoerty.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: meetings
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: This gives us a shortcut to the annotation prpoerty.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: selectImage(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: This selects the appropriate image for our display.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: setDragState(_:animated:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: Sets the drag state for this marker.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: init(coder:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: This class will restore its meeting object from the coder passed in.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.name: encode(with:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchMarker.html#/.abstract: This method saves the meetings and coordinates as part of the serialization.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.name: sCoordinateObjectKey
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.abstract: The Dictionary key for the coordinate object.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.name: sMeetingsObjectKey
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.abstract: The Dictionary key for the list of meetings.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.name: sTitleObjectKey
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.abstract: The Dictionary key for the annotation title value.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.name: init(coder:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.abstract: This method will restore the meetings and coordinate objects from the coder passed in.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.name: encode(with:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnnotation.ht.abstract: This method saves the meetings and coordinates as part of the serialization.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _sSearchResultsSegueID
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: The Search Results Segue ID

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _svCommunicationObject
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is the BMLTiOSLib instance that handles the session with the server.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _locationManager
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This will hold our location manager.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _locationFailedOnce
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: We can do two tries to determine location. This is set to true after the first one.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _searchCenterCoords
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This contains the coordinates we found when we geolocated.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _firstLoad
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is a flag that tells us to run the app upon first load.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: dontDisplayErrorMessage
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is a flag that tells the error display not to yell at us (for now).

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: theBigSearchButton
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is the big fat button that the user presses.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: isSessionValid
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Tells us whether or not we have an active, valid session (read-only)

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: commObject
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is a quick access to the communication object.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: criteriaObject
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Quick access to the search Criteria (read-only)

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _startSearch(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Handles a found location. This starts the process of finding meetings that start today, after our current time.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: _displayErrorAlert(_:inMessage:presentedBy:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Displays the given error in an alert with an OK button.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: We simply use this to make sure our NavBar is hidden.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: prepare(for:sender:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Called as we prepare to bring in the meeting list.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: bigAssButtonWasHit(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is called when the large search button is called.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: startNewConnection()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Sets up a new connection.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: terminateConnection()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Kills the connection.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: bmltLibInstance(_:serverIsValid:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Indicates whether or not the server pointed to via the URI is a valid server (the connection was successful).

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: bmltLibInstance(_:meetingSearchResults:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Returns the result of a meeting search.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: bmltLibInstance(_:errorOccurred:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Called if there is an error.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: locationManager(_:didFailWithError:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is called if the location manager suffers a failure.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: locationManager(_:didUpdateLocations:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: Callback to handle found locations.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: meetingNameLabel
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This is the name of the meeting

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: directionsMapView
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This is the map view that will show the directions.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: busyView
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This is displayed while the directions are being looked up.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: meetingObject
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This is the object that contains our meeting data.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: searchCenterCoords
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This is the location of the search center. We use this to create a map with the right zoom.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: We use this to make sure our NavBar has the correct title.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: regionThatFitsBothUserLocationAndMeetingLocation
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This calculates a region that fits both the current user location and the meeting location.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: setUpMap()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: Set up our map to show the meeting location.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: mapView(_:viewFor:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This delivers a marker view to the map.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAppDelegate.h.name: displayErrorAlert(_:inMessage:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAppDelegate.h.abstract: Displays the given error in an alert with an OK button.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.name: _initialIndex
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.abstract: This will contain our initial indexed image.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.name: isAnimating
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.abstract: Set to true when we are animating.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.name: _nextIndexedImage
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.abstract: This increments the index, looping it, if necessary, then returns the image at the new index.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.name: currentFrameIndex
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.abstract: This is the initial frame index, and increments to represent the current animation frame.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.name: imageNamePrefix
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.abstract: This is a prefix for the image names. We will append a no-leading-zero integer to it (0 - 99)

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: meetingNameLabel
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This is the meeting name label across the top.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: meetingTimeLabel
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This is the weekday and time, just below that.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: addressTextView
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This text view has the adress information.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: commentsTextField
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: If we have comments, they are displayed here.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: mapTopConstraint
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This allows us to expand the map if the comments aren’t shown.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: locationMapView
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This is the map that occupies most of the screen.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: mapTypeSegmentedControl
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This is the segmented control that lets us select the map type.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: directionsButton
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This is the NavBar button for directions.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: meetingObject
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This is the object that contains our meeting data.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: searchCenterCoords
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This is the location of the search center. We use this to create a map with the right zoom.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: mapTypeControlChanged(_:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: Reacts to the map type control being changed.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: We use this to make sure our NavBar has the correct title.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: viewDidLayoutSubviews()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: If we have no comments, then we make the map bigger.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: prepare(for:sender:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: Called as we prepare to bring in the directions controller.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: setUpMap()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: Set up our map to show the meeting location.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.name: mapView(_:viewFor:)
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAddressViewCo.abstract: This delivers a marker view to the map.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.name: goMeLabel
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.abstract: This is the credit label on the top.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.name: aboutUsTextItem
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.abstract: This is more about the app and its distibutor/maintainer.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.name: beanieButton
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.abstract: This is the big Beanie button. If we have a URI, it is enabled, and hitting it executes that URI in the browser.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.name: buttonURI
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.abstract: This is the URI that is executed when someone hits the Beanie Button.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAboutViewCont.abstract: We use this to make sure our NavBar has the correct title.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.name: BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButtonView
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAnimatedButto.abstract: This is a special class that presents a button. When pressed, it starts animating images with up to 100 frames.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAppDelegate.h.name: BMLTNAMeetingSearchAppDelegate
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchAppDelegate.h.abstract: The principal purpose of this app is doemonstrate usage of the BMLTiOSLib project.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.name: BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsViewController
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchDirectionsVie.abstract: This class will display the name of the meeting, and a large map object that will display the directions.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.name: BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewController
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchInitialViewCo.abstract: This is the fundamental instance for the app.

Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html.name: BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs
Classes/BMLTNAMeetingSearchPrefs.html.abstract: This is a very simple persistent user prefs class. It is instantiated as a SINGLETON, and provides a simple, property-oriented gateway

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
